import { DateInputImage } from "/src/components/Images";


# Date Input
Date Input allows user to input date.

<div style={{backgroundColor: 'white',border: '1px solid #F4F6F8', borderRadius: 16, padding: 32, marginBottom: 24}}>
   <DateInputImage />
</div>

```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.DateInputAV
    android:id="@+id/dateInput"
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:text="Pilih Tanggal"
    app:drawableEnd="@drawable/{your_drawable}" />
```

```kotlin
dateInput.setOnClickListener {
    DateTimePickerSheet
        .datePicker()
        .title("Tanggal Update")
        .selectedDate(singleDate)
        .onPositiveButtonClicked { date, _ ->
            singleDate = date
            dateInput.text = date?.formatTo("dd-MM-yyyy")
        }
        .show(it.context)
}
```
